entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the main characters in the story. He is mentioned as having a shock and then deciding that Harry's new spell is amusing.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is another main character in the story. He is mentioned as casting a new spell that Ron finds amusing.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is also one of the main characters in the story. She is mentioned as not cracking a smile during Ron's anecdote and then turning an expression of wintry disapproval upon Harry.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is mentioned as having hand-knitted sweaters that the characters use to pad themselves out.

relationships.description: Ron finds Harry's new spell amusing and decides to regale Hermione with the story.
Hermione turns an expression of wintry disapproval upon Harry.
